code: import React from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import'./AverageSessionsChart.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const daysOfWeek=['L','M','M','J','V','S','D'];const CustomTooltip=_ref=>{let{active,payload}=_ref;if(active&&payload&&payload.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"custom-tooltip",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"label",children:"".concat(payload[0].value," min")})});}return null;};const AverageSessionsChart=_ref2=>{let{data}=_ref2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-container-average",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-wrapper-average",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-header-average",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Dur\xE9e moyenne des ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"sessions"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:"100%",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:data,margin:{top:120,bottom:5,left:10},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"day",tickFormatter:tick=>daysOfWeek[tick-1],tick:{fill:'rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)',opacity:0.6},axisLine:false,tickLine:false}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CustomTooltip,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"sessionLength",stroke:"rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)",strokeWidth:2,dot:false,connectNulls:true})]})})]})});};export default AverageSessionsChart;
